item.title: Implement set using map
item.description: How to Implement Set Using hMap in Golang 1. What is a Set? How is Set Different from HashMap? A set is a data structure that stores a collection of unique elements. Sets do not allow duplicate values and do not maintain any particular order of the elements. A hashmap is a data structure that stores key-value pairs. Each key in a hashmap is unique, and it maps to a specific value.
